posts.post_content:
I am a long-time collector of NY Yankee artifacts and memorabilia, dating mainly from 1903-1927.  Many years ago I lost interest in cards, and I'm finally getting around to selling the cards that were part of my collection.
I'm NOT a card guy--I don't know grading, etc.  So...
I'm going to list some cards, with large scans, and prices I think are fair.  You be the grader.  And feel free to make offers.
